'''Naku Weed Whacker (II)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II]]''. The achievements are earned by following [[Electro Seelie]] on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in [[Inazuma]].
